title: Huge 1 bed with office space and More! Will Not Last!
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom + 1 Den, 1 Bath, approximately 916 Sq.
Featuring a new expanded fitness center, business center w/ WiFi lounge, redesigned clubroom and beautifully refinished homes!
At the hub of everything haute and hip in Southeast Denver you'll find Legend Oaks Apartments, where an evolution in apartment living is emerging.
Here you can walk to Havana Street's fun and funky shopping, eateries and events.
Bike to Cherry Creek's abundant recreation and parks, or spend the day there boutique-browsing and gallery-hopping.
This prime location offers easy access to I-225 and is minutes from downtown, Denver Tech Center, Children's Hospital Colorado and DIA.
Then come home to Legend Oaks' evolving collection of 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments, completely redesigned to complement today's lifestyle.
Here you'll find beautifully refinished homes: All-new kitchens with new cabinets, countertops and clean steel appliances.
Nine-foot ceilings with crown molding, chic updated lighting, fresh wall colors and a cozy gas fireplace.
And of course, your must-have conveniences such as a full-size washer/dryer, private garage and plentiful storage.

Close to I-25, Close to I-225, Cherry Creek Schools, Cherry Creek Challenge School, RTD 83L, RTD 11, RTD 120, RTD light rail, Close to light rail, Gardens on Havana, Close to CU Hospital, Close to Anschutz Medical Campus, Close to Buckley Air Force Base, Close to Cherry Creek, Close to DTC, Cherry Creek Reservoir, Cherry Creek State Park, Highline Canal Trail

Built-in shelving*, Remodeled interiors, Open floorplans, Central heat and AC, Large walk-in closets, Window coverings, 9 foot ceilings with crown molding, Private patio / balcony with storage, Twin basin vanities*, Full size washer / dryer included, Refinished bathrooms with large oval tubs*, Cozy gas fireplaces*, Bedroom access to patio*, Kitchen pantry*, Clean steel & black appliances, Chic lighting & wall colors,

Electronic payments accepted, Picnic gazebo & BBQ area, Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply), Cherry Creek School District, Newly remodeled fitness center, Year-round resort style pool, Mature landscaping, Relaxing spa, Private detached garages available, Off-leash dog park, Gated entry after hours, Newly remodeled business center with free wi-fi
Want more information on this unit?
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
